Desc.entry: A service run by people passionate about high quality person-centered support. Provides a highly personalised, therapist-led, specialist day service for people with autism, learning disabilities, complex needs and/or challenging behaviour. Also provides one-to-one support for community-based activities and can help clients to set up a personalised activity programme with one of the project's qualified therapists. Can offer a 7 days a week service at times to suit each client. Company limited by guarantee no 07111459

category.entry: LEARNING DISABILITIES - ORGANISATIONS FOR PEOPLE WITH
